{
    "basicDetails": {
        "firstName": "vivek",
        "lastName": "karli",
        "mail": "vivekkarli8@gmail.com",
        "mobileNo": "{{$randomPhoneNumber}}"
    },
    "addressDetails": [
        {
            "addressType": "home",
            "addressDesc" : null,
            "defaultAddress": true,
            "addLine1": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "addLine2": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "addLine3": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "pincode": "500001",
            "country": "{{$randomCountry}}"
        },
        {
            "addressType": "work",
            "addressDesc" : null,
            "defaultAddress": false,
            "addLine1": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "addLine2": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "addLine3": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "pincode": "500001",
            "country": "{{$randomCountry}}"
        },
        {
            "addressType": "others",
            "addressDesc" : "other address",
            "defaultAddress": false,
            "addLine1": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "addLine2": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "addLine3": "{{$randomStreetAddress}}",
            "pincode": "500001",
            "country": "{{$randomCountry}}"
        }
    ]
}
